phase1

Class ActionCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • phase1.ActionCard

  • public class ActionCard
extends java.lang.Object
    implements an Action Card that has a description a cash value and a type. It also has a boolean toAll which sets whether the cash value will be distributed to all.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private boolean toAll 
      private int type 
      private double value

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionCard

        public ActionCard(int type)
        Creates an action card object with the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - type will either be 1 (collect from the bank), 2 (pay the bank), 3 (Collect from the player), or 4 (pay player).
